tool.name: Queue genotype workflow

param.name: affy_metadata
param.label: Affymetrix 96 well plate metadata file
param.help: The word 'metadata' must be in the file name.

validator.message: 96 well plate data must have 32 columns and no more than 96 lines of data

param.validator: value is not None and value.metadata.columns==32 and value.metadata.data_lines<=96

param.name: sample_attributes
param.label: Sample attributes file
param.help: The word 'attributes' must be in the file name.

param.name: annot
param.label: Probeset annotation file
param.help: The word 'annotation' must be in the file name.

param.name: summary
param.label: Apt-probeset genotype summary file
param.help: The word 'summary' must be in the file name.

param.name: snp_posteriors
param.label: Apt-probeset genotype snp-posteriors file
param.help: The word 'snp-posteriors' must be in the file name.

param.name: report
param.label: Apt-probeset genotype report file
param.help: The word 'report' must be in the file name.

param.name: confidences
param.label: Apt-probeset genotype confidences file
param.help: The word 'confidences' must be in the file name.

param.name: calls
param.label: Apt-probeset genotype calls file
param.help: The word 'calls' must be in the file name.

validator.message: No cached Fasta genome references are available for the build associated with the selected probeset annotation file.

param.name: delete_all_genotyped_samples
param.label: Delete the all_genotyped_samples.vcf history item?
param.help: Select True to delete the item after copying it to the data library - select False to enable reproducibility

tool.help:
**What it does**
Uses the Galaxy/Bioblend API to execute the complete multilocus genotype analysis pipeline for corals or symbiants. This tool must be able to access the corals (stag) database.
